CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( amc__User__r.Email ), IF(ISBLANK( amc__Contact__r.Email ), IF(ISBLANK( amc__Role__r.amc__Email_Lookup__c ),"",amc__Role__r.amc__Email_Lookup__c), amc__Contact__r.Email),amc__User__r.Email)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula: References the Email of the User or Contact
CustomField.label: Email
